text: The enactment of this chapter shall not cause the abatement of any causes of action affecting public enactments repealed by this title.
historical:

References in Text

"This title," referred to at the end of this section, is title XXI of D.C. Law 4-101.

DC CODE ยง 4-220.02

Current through December 11, 2012

subchapter.text: Nonrevival of Previously Repealed or Superseded Public Enactments; Nonabatement of Causes of Action.
